channel.title: Posts on Indro Spinelli
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Indro Spinelli

item.title: PLVS Teaser
item.description: Luigi Freda and I recently released on social media a teaser of PLVS in action. Here you can find more info and a lot of videos of PLVS showing its capabilities on many different datasets. PLVS is still a work in progress but the software will be released as open-source with our outcoming paper very soon!

item.title: A little wrap-up of the last two years
item.description: This is the first post of my personal page and in some sense, the story behind this blog. I had the privilege to collaborate as a bachelor and later master student to a European project TRADR: Long-Term Human-Robot Teaming for Disaster Response. Something very unusual here in Italy, in fact, it hasn’t been always easy to make this intern at the Alcor lab, which was responsible for the WP4 of the project, coexist with my ordinary studies.
